009package imagingbook.common.util.progress.ij;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import imagingbook.common.util.progress.ProgressMonitor;
013import imagingbook.common.util.progress.ProgressReporter;
014
015/**
016 * An instance of this class monitors the progress of another object (task)
017 * by querying its status periodically.
018 * TODO: Make the associated action more generic (currently progress information is 
019 * used to update ImageJ's peogress bar.
020 * @author WB
021 *
022 */
023public class ProgressBarMonitor extends ProgressMonitor {
024        
025        private final boolean ijRunning;
026        private boolean ijUpdateProgressBar = true;
027        
028        public ProgressBarMonitor(ProgressReporter target) {
029                super(target);
030                this.ijRunning = (IJ.getInstance() != null);
031        }
032
033        @Override
034        public void handleProgress(double progress, long nanoTime) {
035                if (ijRunning && ijUpdateProgressBar) {
036                        IJ.showProgress(progress);
037                }
038                
039        }
040
041}
